dcterms:creator: Matthew Snover
Bonnie Dorr
Richard Schwartz
Linnea Micciulla
John Makhoul
dcterms:description: Translation Edit Rate (TER) is a metric used to evaluate the quality of machine translation by measuring the edit distance between a machine-generated translation and a reference translation.
dcterms:title: TER (Translation Edit Rate)

dcterms:creator: Lucia Specia
Kashif Shah
Jose G.C. de Souza
Trevor Cohn
dcterms:description: QuEst is a framework designed for estimating the quality of translations without requiring reference translations, facilitating the evaluation of machine translation outputs.
dcterms:title: QuEst (Quality Estimation Framework)
